marklogic.body: Life in prison,what's that these days.Sitting on your arse watching the telly, the net,working out in the gym,use of a library,medical and dental,going out to the yard daily for a walk and some fresh air,plenty of cigarettes to smoke,the odd joint and a nice cosy bed to sleep in at night,all in the of Heat and a full stomach.Most of us work and worry our whole lives with the hope of having these Comforts in our elder years.
